body:
It's the perfect time...

I would:

Demote all staff who were in Insidia

Ban 99250 (jk)

Promote Robin and BmB to admin

Make autism jokes legal so DaGoldBrick doesn't get forum banned

Give the middle finger to people who don't like me

Make ToggleSneak legal so I won't get banned and lose us the tourney

Ask staff members who were agreeing on the Michael post who is bias and then promote those I asked to senior mod.

Add a 1 dollar entry pool for each player entering the tourney and put most of it towards the prize pool. This would attract a lot of players to Avicus.

gg why am I not admin yet
